sense.def: Alternative Names ni chi 䘌齒; ya ni 牙䘌 ; ya chi xuan ni 牙齒宣䘌. Pathological Condition of ni 䘌 , hidden worms, disease with a malodorous liquid excreted. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 29: 齒䘌者，是蟲食齒至齦，膿爛汁臭，如蝕之狀，故謂之齒䘌 , “As for hidden-worms teeth , this is a condition where worms consume one’s teeth down to the gums, with pus, festering, and a malodorous liquid. It appears as if eaten by a bug. Hence the designation ‘hidden worms teeth’”. Chi nü 齒衄 , spontaneous tooth bleeding [3]
Alternative Names chi xue 齒血.
Pathological Condition of a spontaneous tooth bleeding. Ji sheng fang 濟生方 Kou chi men 口齒門：必勝散，治 齒衄 , “The ‘powder that will bring victory’ cures spontaneous tooth bleeding ”.
